version 0.3 changes
*******************

0. Vector plots
===============

Add code to plot vectors.

::

     Done

     To plot vectors first select the u conponent for the x-axis and then the v conponent for the y-axis.
     The code works for longitude-latitude (cylindrical projection) and latitude-pressure vector plots. 



1. Contours with vectors on top
===============================

::

     Done

     Add code so that a user can plot contours with a vector plot on top.
